findings.detail: Pre-existing line 157 says 'Write owner_review and owner_signoff schemas to file artifacts' but Owner is read-only (disallowedTools: Edit, Write, Bash). This predates Phase 5 and was not introduced by these changes. The new Mode 4 correctly documents the read-only constraint.
findings.fix: Future phase: update the Teammate API Communication section to clarify that go.md/Lead writes these artifacts on Owner's behalf, matching the D1 proxy pattern established in Mode 4.

summary: All 4 plans implement the escalation round-trip correctly. D1 (Owner read-only proxy) and D2 (Architect no AskUserQuestion) are explicitly documented and enforced. Schemas, config, upward path, downward path, timeout script, and tests all match architecture.toon specifications. 14 integration tests and 36 containment tests (including 6 new) all pass. check-escalation-timeout.sh is executable, uses set -euo pipefail + jq, returns structured JSON. Codebase mapping (ARCHITECTURE.md, INDEX.md, CONCERNS.md, PATTERNS.md) updated with correct cross-references and counts.
